channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Pro-Russian hacker group claims responsibility for DDoS attack on French postal service
item.description: A pro-Russian hacker group has come forward as the perpetrator of a DDoS attack on the French national postal service La Poste that took place on December 22, according to Reuters. The distributed denial-of-service attack took central computer systems at La Poste entirely offline and caused major disruptions in package deliveries just days before Christmas. Reuters reported that the cyberattack on La Poste was still not fully resolved as of Wednesday morning. While regular letters were not affected, postal workers were unable to track packages and online payments through La Banque Postale, the...

item.title: How to track Santa Claus this Christmas Eve using AI
item.description: If you’re a parent with young children, then you’ll probably hear this a lot on Christmas Eve: “Where’s Santa right now?” With tracking tools like the NORAD Santa Tracker and Google’s Santa Tracker, everyone can know when Father Christmas will arrive. Plus, there are now some new AI tools to bring the holiday magic. Here’s […]

item.title: 5 ways VPNs have surprised us this year
item.description: Looking back at a year of innovation

item.title: Pluribus season 2: everything we know so far about the hit Apple TV show's return
item.description: Pluribus season 2 is currently in development for Apple TV – here's what we know about it so far.

item.title: My favorite camera for 2025 was the finest stills camera I’ve ever held — the stunning Hasselblad X2D II
item.description: The Hasselblad X2D II the finest camera for photography ever made – for outright image quality at least – and it also saw a welcome price drop from its predecessor.

item.title: Aflac reveals personal data of 22.6 million people stolen in cyberattack - here's what we know
item.description: Six months after the breach, Aflac determines how many people are affected and starts reaching out.

item.title: Orange fait un cadeau surprise aux Livebox 4 et 5 (mais il peut brider votre Wi-Fi)
item.description: C'est une mise à jour aussi discrète qu'importante. Orange a commencé à déployer une nouvelle fonctionnalité sur ses anciennes Livebox 4 et 5, ainsi que sur les modèles Sosh, pour réduire leur consommation électrique. Attention, cette économie d'énergie passe par une coupure automatique d'une partie du Wi-Fi, ce qui peut impacter la qualité de votre connexion....

item.title: Toyota's Prius Prime saved me gas money but probably not the environment
item.description: I’ve always wondered what it would be like to own a plug-in hybrid, and recently, fate handed me that opportunity. On a recent trip to Vancouver, I rented a 2024 Toyota Prius Prime for nearly two months — the ideal scenario to try out North America’s most popular PHEV. My experience with the Prius Prime Previously, the words "Prius" and "sexy" were rarely used in the same sentence. However, I think the wedge-shaped Prius Prime introduced for 2023 is much sexier than its frumpy predecessors. The sleek shape also pierces the wind better to improve efficiency. It’s lower to the ground than before...

item.title: How to Choose a Computer Monitor (2025): Everything You Need to Know
item.description: Monitors are cheaper, faster, and more beautiful than ever. Here’s how to choose one that will suit your needs and budget.

item.title: The best shows and movies to stream on Netflix in 2025
item.description: Netflix has had an interesting year. Its ad tier, introduced last year, has grown significantly, and its live TV initiative has expanded to include not only weird one-offs like hot-dog-eating grudge matches but also WWE programming. Taking KPop Demon Hunters off Sony's hands for the business equivalent of $200 in a potato chip bag also […]

item.title: Pluribus Season 1s bombshell ending, explained
item.description: The "Pluribus" Season 1 finale unites Carol (Rhea Seehorn) and Manousos (Carlos-Manuel Vesga) and drops several twists.

item.title: Rhea Seehorn breaks down why The Left Hand of Darkness is so important to Pluribus
item.description: Ursula K. Le Guin's sci-fi classic "The Left Hand of Darkness" makes a cameo in "Pluribus" finale. Here's why it's so important.

item.title: Orange améliore ses vieilles Livebox : elles vont consommer beaucoup moins d’énergie grâce à cette nouveauté bienvenue
item.description: Orange a entamé le déploiement d'une nouveauté logicielle intéressante vouée à ses anciennes Livebox 4 et Livebox 5. Cette dernière leur permet désormais de gérer dynamiquement la bande des 5 GHz pour faire d'importantes économies d'énergie.

item.title: The Pluribus cast unpacks Carol and Manousos tense meet-up: It says a lot about being human
item.description: "Pluribus" stars Rhea Seehorn and Carlos-Manuel Vesga dive into Carol and Manousos' finale showdown.

item.title: Rhea Seehorn on Carols explosive Pluribus finale choice: These people have crossed the line
item.description: The "Pluribus" finale sees Carol obtain an atom bomb from the Others. But what does Rhea Seehorn think is next for her?

item.title: C’est peut-être la dernière offre avant Noël pour la PS5 Slim : ce pack avec deux manettes chute sous les 500 €
item.description: Compacte, dotée d'un espace de stockage confortable et toujours aussi performante, la PS5 Slim est bien placée sur le podium des consoles next-gen. Si vous n'avez pas encore craqué, sachez qu'elle est actuellement, et sûrement pour la dernière fois avant la fin des fêtes de fin d'année 2025, en promo : PC Componentes la propose en pack à 494,88 euros au lieu de 599,99 euros. ...

item.title: On a essayé la nouvelle Peugeot 308 électrique restylée, qui s’améliore sur un point en particulier
item.description: Dévoilée en 2023, l’actuelle génération de la Peugeot e-308 passe enfin par la case restylage. La voiture électrique s’offre un style modernisé, mais surtout, elle corrige l’un de ses plus gros défauts. Nous en avons pris le volant, afin de savoir ce qu’elle vaut sur la route.

item.title: Le piratage de La Poste, une « stratégie de sabotage » qui risque de durer
item.description: À quelques heures de Noël, La Poste reste prise en otage par une attaque DDoS qui s’éternise. Pour les experts, il s'agit d'une opération de « sabotage » qui cherche à nuire à la France et aux millions de Français qui attendent un colis. On fait le point sur la cyberattaque à quelques heures du réveillon.

item.title: How to redeem game codes on the Nintendo Switch 2
item.description: Digital game codes remain one of the simplest ways to add new titles to a Nintendo library. The Nintendo Switch 2 handles code redemption in a familiar way, building on the same process used on the original Switch. You can redeem a download code directly from the eShop on the console, or through a browser on a phone or desktop. Both routes link the purchase to the same Nintendo Account so the redeemed title appears on any compatible device tied to that account. The process is quick once you know where to look. Here is how to redeem game codes on Switch 2 through the console and online. Things ...

item.title: Samsung's latest Odyssey gaming monitor has a 32-inch 6K screen with glasses-free 3D
item.description: Ahead of CES 2026, Samsung has unveiled a number of impressive gaming monitors that flaunt 3D and very high refresh rates. The headliner is the 32-inch Odyssey 3D, "the world's first 6K display with glasses free 3D," according to Samsung. Along with the high resolution, it offers a 165Hz refresh rate (boosted to 330Hz through Dual Mode), along with a 1ms GtG response time. Optimized 3D effects that enhance terrain, distance and object separation "beyond 2D" will work with featured games like Stellar Blade and The First Berserker: Khazan," according to Samsung. Another model, the 27-inch Odysse...

item.title: In 2025, AI became a lightning rod for gamers and developers
item.description: 2025 was the year generative AI made its presence felt in the video game industry. Its use has been discovered in some of the most popular games of the year, and CEOs from some of the largest game studios claim it's being implemented everywhere in the industry including in their own development processes. Meanwhile, rank-and-file […]

item.title: The Cosori 5L Rice Cooker review is a multifunctional appliance that delivers mixed results
item.description: This rice cooker can steam, sauté, and slow cook, but its rice cooking capabilities are somewhat disappointing

item.title: Google Pixel phones need power and parity to fix a confusing product strategy in 2026
item.description: Google has positioned itself as the software lover’s choice when it comes to flagship phones – but there are some odd gaps between the standard and Pro handsets.

item.title: The fifth dimension of design
item.description: Why time is the measure of true accessibility. Michael Graves once said regarding a men’s suit, “You can buy a lot of cheap ones, or you can buy one great Armani suit.”

item.title: Boîte de réception | Pourriels, ChatGPT et Google Traduction
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, on se demande qui combat les pourriels, on trouve les limites de l’intelligence artificielle sur son mobile et on désactive la traduction dans Chrome.

item.title: Voici ce que vous devez absolument activer si vous êtes chez Free : la « refonte » 3G ne passe pas sur certains téléphones
item.description: Votre téléphone affiche "4G", vos données fonctionnent, mais vos appels coupent ou n'aboutissent jamais ? Ne cherchez pas, ce n'est pas une panne temporaire. C'est structurel. Free est en train de transformer son réseau, et si votre smartphone n'est pas prêt, vous risquez bien plus qu'une conversation manquée.

item.title: Another image of the DJI Osmo Pocket 4 leaks — and it could come with a mysterious new accessory
item.description: We've got another sign of the DJI Osmo Pocket 4 and something called the DJI Osmo FrameTap.
